entities.name: potter
entities.description: The person being addressed by Umbridge, mentioned as 'Potter' in the text.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as backing up Umbridge's actions, described as having 'the might' behind her.

entities.name: floos
entities.description: The Floo Network Regulator is monitoring the fireplaces in Hogwarts, except for Umbridge's own.

entities.name: inquisitorial_squad
entities.description: Umbridge mentions her Inquisitorial Squad opening and reading all owl post entering and leaving the castle.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Mr. Filch is observing secret passages in and out of the castle, mentioned by Umbridge.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The narrator of the story, who takes advantage of the distraction to empty his tea cup into a vase.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: The person speaking in the text, mentioned as having an Inquisitorial Squad and monitoring communication channels.

relationships.description: The Ministry stands behind Umbridge, backing up her actions.
The Floo Network Regulator is monitoring the fireplaces in Hogwarts, except for Umbridge's own (implied to be related to Harry).
Umbridge mentions her Inquisitorial Squad, implying they are affiliated with her.
Mr. Filch is observing secret passages in and out of the castle at Umbridge's behest.
